short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scans web pages for accessibility issues

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find and fix your website accessibility issues and ensure compliance with global standards using Fezzant A11y Scanner.

How It Works

1. Install Fezzant A11y Scanner from the Web Store

2. Navigate to the Website and Scan

Fezzant A11y Scanner swiftly analyzes the web page and app for accessibility and security issues.

3. Get Detailed Reports

Get comprehensive reports that highlight areas needing improvement, including accessibility barriers and potential security flaws.
